articles.description: Follow 5 Live commentary and live text coverage as Brentford host Liverpool, plus six other Premier League games including Man City v Chelsea.
articles.title: Premier League: Build-up as Brentford host Liverpool

articles.description: Listen to Sportsound commentary of Celtic v Kilmarnock or Open All Mics, watch Sportscene results, and follow live text updates.
articles.title: Scottish Premiership: Leaders Celtic among 10 teams in action

articles.description: England are in a dire position in the third Test after a dramatic collapse and spectacular Yashasvi Jaiswal century gives India complete control in Rajkot.
articles.title: Dire display leaves England facing defeat by India

articles.description: Mohamed Salah scores his first goal for Liverpool since 1 January as they open up a five-point lead at the top of the Premier League.
articles.title: Salah scores on return as Liverpool beat Brentford

articles.description: Arsenal produce a statement victory to ensure their WSL title challenge is not over, while dealing a serious blow to Manchester United's Champions League qualifying hopes.
articles.title: Arsenal beat Man Utd to boost WSL title hopes

articles.description: Follow live text updates from 11 games in the Championship, starting with Plymouth against Leeds.
articles.title: Championship: Plymouth v Leeds starts Saturday's action

articles.description: Follow live Squad Goals and score updates from Saturday's action in League One and League Two.
articles.title: League One and League Two - Squad Goals updates

articles.description: A Bundesliga 2 match between Hansa Rostock and Hamburg is halted by remote control cars with smoke bombs entering the pitch.
articles.title: Remote control cars with smoke bombs halt match

articles.description: Liverpool boss Jurgen Klopp says Xabi Alonso is a "standout" of the new generation of football managers.
articles.title: Alonso a 'standout' from new era of managers - Klopp

articles.description: Tiger Woods is forced to withdraw due to illness in the second round of his PGA Tour return at the Genesis Invitational in California.
articles.title: Tiger Woods withdraws on PGA Tour return due to illness
